Thank you for braving the cold one more time, Mike Pence told the crowd. Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., that would deny federal family-planning funds to any organization that performs abortions. Mike Pence makes clear that Planned Parenthood is his target; it would lose more than$ 70 million in annual funding. Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, Mike Pence said. President Bush at a Feb. 3, 2003 National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the U.N. two days later. Donald Rumsfeld quotes himself as having told the meeting, We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. Tom Watson, a Labour lawmaker, said the Andy Coulson controversy raises questions about David Cameron 's judgment and should trigger a deeper investigation of Murdoch's media empire. The New Sarah Ferguson Times quoted Watson as saying: Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street-we need to get to the truth.
